meanings.definition: Trows: third person singular present of 'trow'
meanings.sent1: She trows the ball to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He always trows his clothes on the chair.
meanings.sent3: The cat trows the toy around playfully.
meanings.sent4: The wind trows the leaves in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The chef trows the ingredients into the pot with a flourish.

meanings.sent1: The trows in the garden are colorful.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of trows flying in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The children played with the trows in the sandbox.
meanings.sent4: The trows on the shelf seemed to be watching us.
meanings.sent5: She collected various trows from different countries during her travels.
